extendedInfo.description: Experience flying over a snowy mountaintop with this amazing live wallpaper.To use, press the menu key, then "Wallpapers" then "Live Wallpapers". Select "Aerial Fly By Wallpaper".Since devices vary, you might need to change the settings slightly. Raise the FPS if the coaster appears to be going too slow and lower it if it is going too fast. If the size is not fullscreen, change the size to "Big".

reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time. Just a movie. Don\'t waste your time.
reviews.author: A Google User
